Promo Code for Max Finale Timed Research

Research
Starts:
Tuesday, July 22, 2025, at 12:00 AM Local Time
Ends:
Sunday, August 24, 2025, at  9:00 PM Local Time

Timed Research Code: GOFESTMAX

In celebration of Pokémon GO Fest 2025: Max Finale, Trainers can use the code GOFESTMAX on the Pokémon GO Web Store to redeem branching Timed Research focused on Max Battles and Buddy Pokémon.

Important Dates:

  • Code expires: August 3, 2025, at 00:00 UTC
  • Research expires: Sunday, August 24, 2025

Complete the research tasks to earn rewards and encounter a Gigantamax Pokémon of your choice—either Rillaboom, Cinderace, or Inteleon—with a Seasonal Special Background!

Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards must be claimed before Sunday, August 24, 2025.
Features Research




Features

How to Redeem

  1. Visit the Pokémon GO Web Store
  2. Enter the code GOFESTMAX
  3. Complete your Timed Research before Sunday, August 24, 2025.

Timed Research Rewards

The branching Timed Research focuses on:

  • Max Battles - Participate in and win Max Battles
  • Buddy Pokémon - Complete tasks with your Buddy

Gigantamax Encounter Reward

Upon completing the research, you’ll be able to encounter one Gigantamax Pokémon of your choice:

  • Gigantamax Rillaboom with Seasonal Special Background
  • Gigantamax Cinderace with Seasonal Special Background
  • Gigantamax Inteleon with Seasonal Special Background

Research

Branching Timed Research

Complete the research tasks to earn rewards and encounter a Gigantamax Pokémon of your choice—either Rillaboom, Cinderace, or Inteleon—with a Seasonal Special Background!

Choose Gigantamax Rillaboom

Choose this option to encounter catch and train a Rillaboom that can Gigantamax.

STEP
1
Gigantamax Journey Timed Research - Choose Rillaboom (1/5)
Collect MP from 3 Power Spots
